summary: My first attempt at a player home, based around the idea of being a werewolf hunter.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first attempt at creating a player home, it took me around 4 hours to do and was alot of trial and error, i hope you enjoy!

REQUIRES DAWNGUARD DLC (i use a couple items from it)

I am planing on expanding it a bit and maybe adding a questline for it.
Location: Follow the east from Dawnstar, you cant miss it.
author: AlphaWolfGaming
